welcome.subject: Welcome to The Fitness Mentor - Your Journey Begins Now
welcome.body:
THE FITNESS MENTOR

Become Your Strongest Self

Welcome to the Journey, {{first_name}}!

First off, I want to personally thank you for joining The Fitness Mentor community. This is the first step toward transforming not just your body, but your mindset and approach to fitness.

Here's what you can expect:

  • Daily Motivation - You'll receive AI-generated motivation messages to keep you focused and inspired
  • Weekly Workout Tips - Practical, science-based advice to optimize your training
  • Nutrition Insights - Simple strategies to fuel your body for performance and results

Tomorrow, you'll receive your first motivational message. In the meantime, here's a thought to consider:

"The journey of transformation begins with a single decision - the decision to show up consistently, even when motivation fades. That decision starts today."

If you're ready to take your fitness journey to the next level with personalized guidance, consider booking a free consultation call.

To your success,

The Fitness Mentor

consultation_confirmation.body:
THE FITNESS MENTOR

Consultation Confirmed

Hi {{first_name}},

Your free 15-minute fitness consultation has been confirmed!

CONSULTATION DETAILS:

Date: {{appointment_date}}

Time: {{appointment_time}}

Format: Video call via Zoom

Meeting Link: {{zoom_link}}

How to Prepare:

  • Make note of any equipment you have access to
  • Prepare questions you have about the coaching process

I'm looking forward to discussing how we can work together to achieve your fitness goals!
